meanings.definition: A type of shrub with spiny leaves and clusters of yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The mahonias in the garden have beautiful yellow flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted several mahonias along the fence for privacy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorns in the mahonias.
meanings.sent4: The mahonias stood like guardians with their spiny leaves protecting the garden.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the mahonias filled the air with sweetness.
